TopicTitle: Good news! KSP 2 roads,bases,runways and space centers REVAILED

Articles.Content:
Watch this at KSP 2 Show & Tell Highlights

 

Edited September 8, 2021 by KSP Dragon

Well, yes.

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/113-show-and-tell/

Make sure to check it every other Friday, it's more frequent than youtube videos (and often include dev comments)

That's amazing!

But damn (is not a swear word!). Ya english. The title of the thread should be "Good news! KSP2 has roads, bases, and runways REVEALED!"

This base building mechanic intrigues me a lot. I'm going to use it to turn Laythe into the second Kerbin once I get KSP2.  Build a full space center that can assemble and launch all kinds of spacecraft there, and settle dozens of Kerbonauts. Also, Minmus should become an auxiliary spaceport in early game.

Can't wait to see what other worlds there will be which are 'Kerbin like'. Gurdamma is an obvious contender so far
